unnormalised: Delhi's air quality continues to be a concern, folks! While we saw some improvement after Diwali, the levels are creeping back up. Remember those smoggy mornings that felt like scenes from a Bollywood thriller? Yeah, not ideal.
normalised: Delhi's air quality continues to be a concern, folks! While we saw some improvement after Diwali, the levels are creeping back up. Remember those smoggy mornings that felt like scenes from a Bollywood thriller? Yeah, not ideal.

unnormalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) data shows that the Air Quality Index (AQI) is fluctuating between "poor" and "very poor" in several areas, particularly near industrial zones like Faridabad and Ghaziabad. Experts at TERI (The Energy and Resources Institute) are suggesting measures like stricter enforcement of construction dust control norms.
normalised: The Central Pollution Control Board (C P C B) data shows that the Air Quality Index (A Q I) is fluctuating between "poor" and "very poor" in several areas, particularly near industrial zones like Faridabad and Ghaziabad. Experts at The Energy and Resources Institute (T E R I) are suggesting measures like stricter enforcement of construction dust control norms.

unnormalised: It's not just Delhi either! Many tier-2 cities like Kanpur and Lucknow are also battling with similar air quality issues. Time to dust off those masks and maybe even consider an air purifier. Let's hope for some good rainfall soon to wash away the pollutants! We really need to pull up our socks and make a conscious effort to reduce emissions; otherwise, our future generations will be paying the price, like, big time!
